import React from 'react'; import { DropdownMenu, DropdownItem, DropdownToggle, Card, Media, UncontrolledDropdown } from "reactstrap"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; //i18n import { useTranslation } from 'react-i18next'; function AttachedFiles(props) { const files = props.files; /* intilize t variable for multi language implementation */ const { t } = useTranslation(); return ( { files.map((file, key) =>
{file.name}

{file.size}
    • {t('Action')} {t('Another Action')} {t('Delete')}
) } ); } export default AttachedFiles;
